gst.ui

Class DataSelectionDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • gst.ui.DataSelectionDialog

  • public class DataSelectionDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a dialog for selecting specific data from all loaded datasets.
    Version:
    1.0.1 (02.08.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<DataController> controller
      list of all controllers available
      private java.awt.Component message
      the message part of the dialog (JList or JLabel)
      private int[] selectedIndices
      array of selected indices

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataSelectionDialog(java.util.List<DataController> selectedController)
      Constructs the dialog from all available gst.data.Unisensdataset.
      DataSelectionDialog(java.util.List<DataController> availableController, java.util.List<DataController> selectedController)
      Constructs the dialog from a given list of DataController.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.List<DataController> createControllerListFromSelectedIndices()
      Creates a list of selected controllers from selectedIndices and controller.
      private void initEmptyDialog()
      Initializes the member variables message and selectedIndices if there is no data loaded.
      java.util.List<DataController> show()
      Shows the data-selection-dialog and returns the DataControllers selected by the user.
      DataController showSingleSelection()
      Shows the data-selection-dialog and returns the DataController selected by the user.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataSelectionDialog

        public DataSelectionDialog(java.util.List<DataController> selectedController)
        Constructs the dialog from all available gst.data.Unisensdataset.
        Parameters:
        selectedController - List of initially selected DataController

      • DataSelectionDialog

        public DataSelectionDialog(java.util.List<DataController> availableController,
                   java.util.List<DataController> selectedController)
        Constructs the dialog from a given list of DataController.
        Parameters:
        availableController - List of gst.data.DataController to display
        selectedController - List of initially selected gst.data.DataController

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public java.util.List<DataController> show()
        Shows the data-selection-dialog and returns the DataControllers selected by the user.
        Returns:
        list of selected DataController

      • showSingleSelection

        public DataController showSingleSelection()
        Shows the data-selection-dialog and returns the DataController selected by the user.
        Returns:
        the selected DataController or null (if non is selected)

      • initEmptyDialog

        private void initEmptyDialog()
        Initializes the member variables message and selectedIndices if there is no data loaded.

      • createControllerListFromSelectedIndices

        private java.util.List<DataController> createControllerListFromSelectedIndices()
        Creates a list of selected controllers from selectedIndices and controller.
        Returns:
        list of selected controllers, if no controller is selected an empty list
